alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 12:58PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Huerfano, western Las Animas and central Pueblo Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Walsenburg, or 30 miles north of Trinidad, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Huerfano, western Las Animas and central Pueblo Counties, including the following locations... Weston and Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
